plot: A light-hearted look at the worldwide phenomenon of video games, and how they have revolutionized technology and forever changed popular culture.
title: The Video Game Revolution
plot_es: A light-hearted look at the worldwide phenomenon of video games, and how they have revolutionized technology and forever changed popular culture.
plot_en: A light-hearted look at the worldwide phenomenon of video games, and how they have revolutionized technology and forever changed popular culture.
